LanguageData.TabSorting.VanillaUI.Label: Vanilla UI Expanded mod is loaded, some settings not available. Restart is needed to apply the main sorting
LanguageData.TabSorting.VanillaUI.Tooltip: Vanilla UI Expanded has a more user-friendly UI for organizing tabs. The main sorting functions of this mod is still available but manual designations or sorting of the tabs themselves will not be applied.
LanguageData.TabSorting.ResetTabsort: All tabs will revert back to their vanilla values. Continue?
LanguageData.TabSorting.ResetButtonsort: All Buttons will revert back to their vanilla values. Continue?
LanguageData.TabSorting.ResetOne: All items in this tab will be restored to their original tabs and this tab will be removed. Continue?
LanguageData.TabSorting.MorePlanning: The More Planning mod is loaded and will loose its colored designators if the sorting is redone after game-start. Do you want to resort the menu? If NO, only the settings will be saved and applied the next game-start.
LanguageData.TabSorting.DeepStorage:
LWM's Deep Storage is active. It has its own logic for sorting storage-furniture. For compatibility, please turn OFF the following options in LWMs settings:

- Always show storage categry?
- Put (almost) ALL storage units here?
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortLights.Label: Sort lights
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortLights.Tooltip: Moves all lights to the Lights-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortFloors.Label: Sort floors
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortFloors.Tooltip: Moves all floors to the Floors-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortWallsDoors.Label: Sort walls and doors
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortWallsDoors.Tooltip: Moves all doors and walls to the Structure-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortDoors.Label: Sort doors separately
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortDoors.Tooltip: Moves all doors to the Doors-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortTablesChairs.Label: Sort tables and chairs
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortTablesChairs.Tooltip: Moves all tables and chairs the Table/Chairs-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortBedroom.Label: Sort bedroom furniture
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortBedroom.Tooltip: Moves all bedroom-furniture to the Bedroom-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortKitchen.Label: Sort kitchen furniture
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortKitchen.Tooltip: Moves all kitchen-furniture to the Kitchen-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortHospital.Label: Sort hospital furniture
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortHospital.Tooltip: Moves all hospital-furniture to the Hospital-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortResearch.Label: Sort research furniture
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortResearch.Tooltip: Moves all research-furniture to the Research-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortDecoration.Label: Sort decorations
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortDecoration.Tooltip: Moves all rugs, plantpots and other cosmetic items to the Decorations-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortStorage.Label: Sort storage
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortStorage.Tooltip: Moves all storage to the Storage-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortGarden.Label: Sort garden tools
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortGarden.Tooltip: Moves all garden items to the Garden-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortFences.Label: Sort fences
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortFences.Tooltip: Moves all fences to the Fences-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortIdeology.Label: Sort ideology
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortIdeology.Tooltip: Moves all Ideology related furniture to the Ideology-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.RemoveEmpty.Label: Remove empty tabs after sorting
LanguageData.TabSorting.RemoveEmpty.Tooltip: If a tab has no things left to build after sorting, remove the tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.GroupThings.Label: Group things that use the same designator dropdown
LanguageData.TabSorting.GroupThings.Tooltip: Some items can use the same button, similar to when an item can be built with different materials. Enabling this option makes it possible to treat these as one item to move instead of individual items.
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortTabs.Label: Sort all tabs alphabetically
LanguageData.TabSorting.SortTabs.Tooltip: Puts all tabs in alphabetical order
LanguageData.TabSorting.SkipZoneOrders.Label: But skip Orders and Zone-tab
LanguageData.TabSorting.SkipZoneOrders.Tooltip: Orders and Zone-tab will remain in the top if the menu
LanguageData.TabSorting.ManualReset.Label: Manual sorting reset
LanguageData.TabSorting.ManualReset.Tooltip: Reset all manually defined sortings and order of gizmos
LanguageData.TabSorting.MapRunning.Label: NOTICE: If you have a running map you might get a graphic issue with the placement of the info-box when adding/removing tabs. If so, a reload of the save should help.
LanguageData.TabSorting.HideEmptyTabs.Label: Hide empty tabs
LanguageData.TabSorting.HideEmptyTabs.Tooltip: Will not show architect tabs that has nothing in them
LanguageData.TabSorting.VerboseLogging.Label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.TabSorting.VerboseLogging.Tooltip: Shows verbose logging during sorting, for finding errors
